Data Processing¶

src.data_processing.cifar_10_helper.get_cifar_10(force_download: bool = False)[source]¶
get_cifar_10 will:
  • Download data
  • Unzip data
  • Place data in correct dir
Parameters:force_download (bool) – Will delete current download and re-download
